bibl.title: "As Is the Generations of Leaves" in Homer, Simonides, Horace, and Stobaeus.
bibl.note: An earlier version of this paper appeared in: Arethusa 29 (1996) pp. 263-282. - I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 19-20 and Homer, Il. VI, 145-149. - Pp. 286-288: Appendix. Passages by "Mousaios", Pindar, Bacchylides, Empedocles, Aristophanes, and Vergil (also alluding to Homer's simile).
